sentences.en: Indonesia, with 216 million people, is the fourth most populous country in the world.
sentences.cn: 印度尼西亚，2.16亿人口，是人口占世界第4位的国家。

sentences.en: Nigeria is the most populous African country and an economic powerhouse for the continent.
sentences.cn: 尼日利亚是非洲人口最稠密的国家，也是非洲大陆的经济强国。

sentences.en: The central state, though often very rich and very populous, was intrinsically fragile.
sentences.cn: 尽管中央帝国非常富足且人口稠密，但本质上还很脆弱。
